member.name: EMRCREATEPALETTE
member.summary: The EMRCREATEPALETTE structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRCREATEPALETTE.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRCREATEPALETTE.ihPal
member.summary: Index of palette in handle table.

member.name: EMRCREATEPALETTE.lgpl
member.summary: A structure that contains information about the palette. Note that peFlags members in the PALETTEENTRY structures do not contain any flags.
